text: Who's Got the Action? is a 1962 American comedy movie directed by Daniel Mann and was based on the novel by Alexander Rose. It stars Dean Martin, Lana Turner, Walter Matthau, Eddie Albert, Jack Albertson and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1962 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Daniel Mann Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Who's Got the Action?
